When we tested the Instant Vortex Plus, we were blown away by the results. Even though it uses little to no oil, we didn't have to put up with soggy fries and anemic-looking chicken wings - it turned out delicious crispy fries, with soft fluffy potato centers, and succulent juicy wings with crisp skin.
This huge Prime Day air fryer deal means you can save 35% today, and believe us when we say that once you try the Instant Vortex Plus, you won’t want to go back to traditional frying ever again.

Making fries in an oven gives you tasty results but it’s quite a time-consuming process - and then there's the mess to clean up after too. Peeling and chopping the potatoes, par-boiling them, coating them in low-calorie spray oil or olive oil, and turning them halfway through 30 minute cooking time all mounts up.

We found that the Instant Pot Vortex Plus shaved 10-15 minutes off the prep and cooking time, and the frying basket that the fries cook in can simply be shaken to rotate the fries to ensure they’re crisp all the way around. The best bit? The results were extremely crisp and even - a better result than we could achieve in the oven. This is thanks to the use of hot air which circulates around the food. You only need a little oil - a 1.1lb / 500g batch of fries uses 2tsp of oil, which is considerably less than deep-frying.
